title: SEDE DE VENCER WITH WAVES FOR WATER AND NEYMAR JR
description: Last month, Waves for Water partnered with Neymar Jr. and his institute to help provide clean water to 85,000 people during the Confederation's Cup in Brazil. Yes, you could say Sede De Vencer (aka Thirsty To Win) was a success. See more at http://hurley.com/h2o and http://wavesforwater.org

asset.author: Hurley
